==Translingual==

===Etymology===
Variant/corruption of [[句]], via 口 → 厶. In present form {{Han compound|勹|t1=hook|厶}}.

Also {{Han simp|冓}} in [[购]] (from [[購]]) and [[沟]] (from [[溝]]).
